books.title: Simply Irresistible
books.author: Jill Shalvis
books.synopsis: Starting over won't be easy. Yet Maddie sees the potential for a new home and a new career.

books.title: Virgin River
books.author: Robyn Carr
books.synopsis: When recently widowed Melinda Monroe sees an advert for a midwife in the remote town of Virgin River, she decides this is the perfect place to escape her heartache.

books.title: Dance Away with Me
books.author: Susan Elizabeth Phillips
books.synopsis: In running away to this new life, Tess wonders- Has she lost herself . . . or has she found her future?

books.title: Safe Haven
books.author: Nicholas Sparks
books.synopsis: Love hurts. There is nothing as painful as heartbreak. But in order to learn to love again you must learn to trust again.

books.title: Sweet Dreams
books.author: Kristen Ashley
books.synopsis: After leaving her cheating husband, Lauren moves to Carnal, Colorado, and gets a job as a waitress in a biker bar called Bubba's.

books.title: Love on the Brain
books.author: Ali Hazelwood
books.synopsis: A new STEMinist rom-com in which a scientist is forced to work on a project with her nemesis - with explosive results.

books.title: Mr. Wrong Number
books.author: Lynn Painter
books.synopsis: Things get textual when a steamy message from a random wrong number turns into an anonymous relationship in this hilarious rom-com by Lynn Painter.

books.title: Book Lovers
books.author: Emily Henry
books.synopsis: An insightful, delightful, instant #1 New York Times bestseller from the author of Beach Read and People We Meet on Vacation.
